thread.title: Hillary Clinton Confronts Critics at First Democratic Debate
thread.title_full: Hillary Clinton Confronts Critics at First Democratic Debate - WSJ

author: Colleen Nelson McCain,
title: Hillary Clinton Confronts Critics at First Democratic Debate
text:
LAS VEGAS—Hillary Clinton on Tuesday went on offense in the first Democratic presidential debate on gun control, foreign policy and the Republican probe of her email server, while also punching back against a quartet of primary rivals seeking to knock her out of front-runner status.
On the issue of guns, Mrs. Clinton was asked if her chief rival, Vermont Sen. Bernie Sanders, was tough enough on the issue. Her reply: “No, not at all.”...
